aboutDescription:
Welcome to Simbolon Phuket Tour!
Your Trusted Travel Partner in Thailand

Sawasdee Khub! üáπüá≠
Simbolon Phuket Tour (SPT) is an official Indonesia-based company serving travelers for trips to Phuket, Bangkok, and other popular destinations in Thailand.

We have served over 500+ travelers from Indonesia, Asia, Europe, and Russia, providing comfortable, safe, and memorable vacation experiences.
With our experienced team and native Thai/Indonesian/Malay/Russian guides, we are ready to assist with tour packages, van rentals, and even FREE custom itineraries. Enjoy a hassle-free and exciting vacation with SPT!
legal: Founded in 2024 in partnership with Major Tour Phuket Co., Ltd., we hold an official Tourism Business Registration License in Thailand (TAT No.: 31/01045). We collaborate with top-quality stakeholders who each bring over 15 years of industry experience, and we‚Äôre proud to be registered members of the Thai Travel Agent Association (TTAA). Our office is located in Phuket at 128/73 Pracha Uthit Rd., Ratsada, Mueang Phuket, Postal Code 83000, Thailand, operating under the umbrella of Major Phuket Group Co., Ltd.

cancellationPolicyText: Cancellations made 7 days or more before the tour date will receive a 100% refund. Cancellations made between 3-6 days before the tour date will receive a 50% refund. No refund for cancellations made less than 3 days before the tour date or for no-shows. Changes to booking dates are subject to availability and may incur additional fees. All refunds will be processed within 7-10 business days.
